question: Which of the following is not a consequence of climate change?

choices.explain: This was a trick question :) Good job reading carefully.
CO2 + H2O --> H2CO3. Ocean acidification causes coral bleaching.
Less sea ice shortens the hunting seasons for polar bears. Desperate males often go for cubs. https://youtu.be/Rfo233Q6aOg
Reduced Arctic sea ice causes atmospheric circulation patterns favorable for unpredictable weather. https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/news/climate-change-and-extreme-snow-us
